dataPage.pageSubHeading: Pangani dawunilodi ma failo a CSV (comma-separated value) omwe ali ndi zambiri zokhudza anthu amene akugwiritsa nchito komanso zimene akhala akuchita ndi zinthu zimene zili mu chipangizo chimenechi
dataPage.detailsSubHeading: Ulendo uliwonse umene munthu waona zinthu
dataPage.summarySubHeading: Nthawi zonse pamodzi/mmene chinthu chilichonse chikuyendera
dataPage.detailsInfo: Munthu akaona zinthu, timasunga nthawi imene wathera akuona komanso mmene zikuyendera. Danga lililonse mu failo ino limasunga ulendo uliwonse umene munthu waona zinthu zina. Zimenezi zikuphatikiza maulendo amene munthu waona zinthu koma asanalowe pa pulofailo.
dataPage.summaryInfo: Munthu akhoza kuona zinthu zimodzimodzi nthawi zingapo. Failo ino imasunga nthawi yonse imene munthu waona zinthu komanso mmene munthuyo akuchitira ndiponso zimene wakwanitsa kuchita. Timachita zimenezi mwina potengera maulendo amene munthuyo waona zinthuzo. Sitisunga zimene munthu waonaasanalowe pa pulofailo.
